divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside having a smoke before bed , when i just happened to look up , when i first saw it i thought it was a satellite at first but it was moving from the south west heading in a north north east direction. While watching it I thought to myself that satellite is really bright and moving really fast and it was out of my site with in a minute .
Summary: solid white light no flashing very bright rapid speed with no sound heading north
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Brampton
There were no other sightings in Brampton on or around June 19th 2013
